title: Himi 79
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Pea ‘iloange
Na’e ‘alu hifo
‘A e ‘Otua fua’a
Koe’uhi ko au.
2.
’A ia ko Sīsū
Ko hoku Huhu’i;
Pea hoko kiate au
‘I he Laumālie.
3.
Ko hoku Hau ia,
Mo hoku kāinga;
Pea ne pehē mai leva
‘Oku ‘a’ana au.
4.
Pea valoki’i
Hoku laumālie,
Pea u hoko ‘o mamahi
Pea u manavahē.
5.
Pea ngangana ai
‘Eku nge’esi lotu
‘I he ngāue mālohi
‘A e Laumālie.
6.
Pea u longo mate
‘I he’eku hia,
Pea u hinga ki he Lami
Mo ‘ene pekia.
7.
Pea ne u hao ai
‘I he’eku tui,
‘I he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi. *
